title: Rework Warwick . . .
body:
-'s tail is so FLUFFY 

I wanna touch it
http://images4.fanpop.com/image/photos/23000000/Mort-Wants-A-Hug-penguins-of-madagascar-23075185-420-212.gif

replies.body: The pod joked around with the idea of an arts and crafts project, a cosplay onesie of Warwick with the tail just being a giant beanbag chair.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot MEMEMEMEME,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lUXTOfMd,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-27T22:43:04.859+0000)
>
> The pod joked around with the idea of an arts and crafts project, a cosplay onesie of Warwick with the tail just being a giant beanbag chair.

You're one dark step away from trespassing into Furrydom.

There is nothing wrong with being a furry.

Anything can be taken too far.

Laughing Fish inserts some "That's my fetish" meme or something

oh wait...
Cottontail WW, his backing animation has him just curled up in his tail.
that would be a comfy chair

Me: ooh ww has a fluffy tail
Warwick: (mauls my arm off)
Not seen it in ranked yet tho
